page.title: 15TOWPATH WALK CONTINUED
page.content: THE LAST LOCK KEEPER ALSO SOLD LAMP GLASSES AND OTHER ITEMS NEEDED BY THE BOAT PEOPLE. BY THE LOCK IS THE CANAL SHOP.IN THE SUMMERTIME MRS WALDRON OPENS THE SHOP TO SELL SOUVENIRS,SWEETS AND CANAL ITEMS TO VISITORS.SHE IS A CANAL ARTIST AND DECORATES CANALWARE WHICH IS SOLD HERE AND ELSEWHERE. WALKING ON FROM THE LOCK TO BRIDGE 18 WE NOTICED BITS OF CLAY PIPE,FRAGMENTS OF POTTERY AND FRESH-WATER SHELLS ON THE GROUND.THESE HAVE AT SOMETIME BEEN BEEN DREDGED UP FROM THE CANAL.JUST BE- FORE REACHING THE BRIDGE THERE IS A LITTLE BRICK STORE WHICH HOLDS PLANKS SIMILAR TO SCAFFOLDING PLANKS.THESE ARE ALL AN EXACT LENGTH SO THAT THEY CAN BE USED TO BLOCK OFF PART OF THE CANAL WHEN THE WATER BOARD WISH TO DRAIN IT FOR REPAIRS.THE NOTCHES THE PLANKS FIT INTO ARE UNDER THE BRIDGE.
